title: Stop banning Shaco in Ascension
body: I want to play him. Thanks.

replies.body:
Ban champion X because he has a cheese tactic. Distracting people from the real champs of the game mode.

Meanwhile, I got S rank on Kass, all because the ascension buff allows him to rift walk with impunity.
I played so many games of Ascension and never saw a Kass. Everyone too busy playing the new assassins or tanks.
Nunu can chunk down Xerath pretty quickly while getting a 5th of his healthbar back on each chomp.
